---
category: news
title: "When Therapy Harms Neurodivergent Clients"
excerpt: "When autistic clients are misdiagnosed, they can waste years in therapy feeling confused and misunderstood. Therapists must take a humble stance when working with clients of a different neurotype. Neurodiverse-affirming therapy begins with a safe sensory space and respect for different subjectivities."
